about_the_game:
CONQUER THE CREATORS
You're Cage, an underdog streamer, teetering on the brink of obscurity. Seize a mysterious invitation to stream WISH, an unexplored MMO, and buckle up for the ride of your life.



  • Tactical auto-battler RPG plus Streamer simulator all in one!
  • You've never experienced a story like this
  • Recruit adventurers with the LFG Party System
  • Unlock powerful combat abilities by creating Formations
  • Watch in horror as your in-game choices bleed into the real world!
  • 25+ endings
  • Fully voiced




FORGE YOUR STREAMING PERSONA
Inspired by the Persona series and with an innovative RPG auto-battle system, every choice you make shapes your path. Will you be a family-friendly entertainer or a controversial edgelord? Each decision impacts your journey and your audience. Balance is key; keep your energy high, stress low, and sanity in check to dazzle your audience stream after stream.



MASTER THE MMO, MASTER YOUR FATE
As Cage, dive into WISH and lead massive raids through a rich, expansive world brimming with quests, mystical artifacts, and treacherous dungeons. Watch your subscriber count soar as you become a streaming legend.



UNRAVEL FANTASTIC MYSTERIES
Uncover the enigmatic lore of the Monumentals, gargantuan beings consuming cities, and the Whisperers, mysterious figures holding the balance. Your streaming journey intertwines with these mysteries, leading to unexpected revelations.



A STREAMER'S DILEMMA
Who Influences the Influencers? As you skyrocket to fame and fortune, a lingering question haunts every stream – who really controls the world of WISH, and what's their game?



READY FOR THE SPOTLIGHT?
Join Cage's exhilarating quest to become a streaming superstar in WISH. Make choices, build your legacy, and unveil hidden truths. Your streaming empire awaits!

name: Stream or Die!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Conteúdo sexual
Atos criminosos

short_description: Become the greatest streamer of all time in STREAM OR DIE! -- an RPG inside an RPG -- game-ception! Embark on your quest for fame by streaming a wild new MMO - where your choices can rocket you to viral glory or comically seal your doom.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
